name: Feather Down Farms at Aller Farm

reviews.text: We took teenagers who loved it and not a plasma screen in sight..
reviews.title: Chilled holiday kids and grown ups really relax

reviews.text: Emma and Nigel are charming full of local knowledge. Comfy beds camping without back pain. Lovely location. Our top tip is to fill a thermos flask with water for coffee in the morning in moments rather than waiting for the fire to be hot enough!
reviews.title: Simply Superb

reviews.text: Have to say I was not totally sold on the idea of glamping by any stretch of the imagination, but went along with it as husband and daughter wanted to do it so much!
reviews.title: Fab family holiday

reviews.text: Well it was fantastic, Emma and Nigel could not have been nicer or more welcoming, my daughter was made to feel totally at ease from the second she arrived and was delighted to be allowed to help feed Doris the calf, milk cows and look after chickens, particularly when they laid 2 eggs a day!
reviews.title: First time Glampers

reviews.text: The accommodation is so much more that a tent, with everything you could need (apart from full bathroom, but hey this is camping) and the setting is perfect, calm and relaxing.
reviews.title: Such fun & fabulous hosts. Loved it!
